Uses of Interface
com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.IPhysicalTopology

  • Packages that use IPhysicalTopology 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.app
    Provides a concrete rules engine that uses the SharedTuplePlatform to exchange tuples between engines.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform
    Provides the basic framework for sharing data within or between JVMs.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology
    Provides framework for physical and logical topology representation and monitoring.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.application
    Provides a framework for applications to define logical topolical relationships between nodes.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical
    Defines the requirements of the physical topology data structures and monitoring of the physical topology.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.bcast
    Provides broadcast-based physical topology monitor, deprecated in favor of the mcast package.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.centralized  
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.mcast
    Provides multicast-based physical topology monitor.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.star
    Provides a physical topology implementation using a separate IDistributedApplicationRegistry implementation and thus assumes a fully connected network of nodes.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.gaian
    Provides a distributed neighbor monitoring system for the gaian database nodes.

    • Uses of IPhysicalTopology in com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.app

      Methods in com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.app with parameters of type IPhysicalTopology 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DSMEngine.membershipChanged(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc, IPhysicalTopology physTopo)
      Check to see if the population of peers has changed, and if so, make another evaluation.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void AbstractSharedDataPlatform.membershipChanged(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc, IPhysicalTopology physTopo)
      Call all the registered listeners when this instance's ITopologyMonitor notifies us.

      interface  IPhysicalTopologyMonitor

      java.util.Collection<IApplicationDescriptor> IApplicationTopology.getApplicationPeers(IApplicationDescriptor app, TopologyRelationship topoRelation, IPhysicalTopology physTopo)
      Get all the application peers that have the given topological relationship with the given node.
      java.util.Collection<TopologyRelationship> IApplicationTopology.getRelationships(IApplicationDescriptor wrt, IApplicationDescriptor to, IPhysicalTopology physTopo)

      void IPhysicalTopologyListener.membershipChanged(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc, IPhysicalTopology physTopo)

    • Uses of IPhysicalTopology in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical

      Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical that implement IPhysicalTopology 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractPhysicalTopologyMonitor
      Provides support for the listener infrastructure required by a topology monitor.
      class  InternalPhysicalTopoMonitor
      Used primarily for testing and provides a JVM-local implementation of a monitor that only monitors the applications in the JVM in which it is located.

    • Uses of IPhysicalTopology in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.bcast

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BcastTopologyMonitor
      Deprecated. 
      in favor of using a broadcast address with McastTopologyMonitor.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  McastTopologyMonitor
      Extends the super class to define the client/server sockets as multi-cast sockets.

    • Uses of IPhysicalTopology in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.star

      Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.star that implement IPhysicalTopology 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractStarTopologyMonitor 
      class  StarTopology
      Uses an IDistributedApplicationRegistry to provide neighbor and reachability information.
      class  StarTopologyMonitor
      Implements a topology monitor that uses an IDistributedApplicationRegistry to provide neighbor and reachability information for this node.

    • Uses of IPhysicalTopology in com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.gaian

      Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.gaian that implement IPhysicalTopology 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GaianNeighborOnlyTopologyMonitor
      Proxies the DSM-configured IPhysicalTopologyMonitor to restrict lookups to only return information about neighbors as defined by the Gaian implementation of INeighborProvider.
      class  PhysicalTopologyMonitorProxy
